agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Natural Resources & Economic Development TIME & DATE: 1:30 PM or upon adjournment Wednesday, April 3, 2019 PLACE: E1.012 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Brian Birdwell SB 728 Kolkhorst | et al. Relating to the verification of information provided to the comptroller and contained in reports on compliance with agreements under the Texas Economic Development Act. SB 1319 Birdwell | et al. Relating to an annual report submitted to the comptroller by a county that imposes certain hotel occupancy taxes. SB 1516 Birdwell Relating to liability for obtaining improper unemployment compensation benefits. SB 1719 Lucio Relating to the allocation of certain state hotel occupancy tax revenue. SB 1850 Rodríguez Relating to the storage, transportation, processing, and disposal of scrap tires. SB 2309 Kolkhorst Relating to the transfer of jurisdiction over and management of the Star of the Republic Museum to the Texas Historical Commission. Public testimony will be limited to 2 minutes. If submitting written testimony, you must include your name or the name of your organization on each copy, and you must likewise email a digital copy to the clerk of the committee.
